page.title: 05Recreation _ Dunnington
page.content: We found from our questionnaires that many parents play sport.The most popular was tennis followed by badminton,squash and keepfit.Other pastimes in order of popularity included reading,sewing,knitting,dress making,listening to music and car maintenance. Activities that parents conducted with their children :- squash, swimming, trips out, swing ball, soccer, camping, picnics, fishing, working around the house, ice skating , horse riding and vists to the seaside. We found that adults watched television for an average of 15 hours per week.The most popular programes were the news,Dallas,Dynasty,adventure films,and documentaries.
